Text: Family Fortunes is a British television game show based on the American game show "Family Feud".

--------------------
Text: Family Fortunes:  The programme ran on ITV from 6 January 1980 to 30 December 2004, before being revived by the same channel in 2006 under the title of All Star Family Fortunes.
